item.title: Amazon is selling a $249 portable power station for $123 that's 'dependable' and 'well-designed'
item.description: "After a year of use, this portable power station is still going strong."

item.title: Budget airline to cut all flights to US city amid low demand, no refunds
item.description: The airline's last flight to this city ran on August 31.

item.title: What this week's inflation numbers mean for the stock market
item.description: With stocks near record highs, here's how this week's CPI and PPI report could move markets.

item.title: Teen suicide triggers ChatGPT parental controls
item.description: AI’s rapid growth sparks fears for children’s safety, and ChatGPT parent controls may not be enough.

item.title: Paramount's return to office mandate sparks fear of mass layoffs
item.description: A bold new in-office work requirement at Paramount has insiders whispering and employees scrambling to decide their future.
